    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplyMultinomial

        public ApplyMultinomial(java.util.List<java.lang.String> vocabulary,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> priorCMap,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> probMap,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Parameters:
        vocabulary - All the words, including doubles.
        priorCMap - A map containing all the categories and its probability.
        probMap - A map containing all the words and its probability.
        list - A list array of all the words of the applying document. Contains doubles.

    • Method Detail

      • extractTokensFromDoc

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> extractTokensFromDoc()
        Checks if the words in the list are present in the vocabulary.
        Returns:
        a list of words both present in the applying document AND the vocabulary.

      • getBestCategory

        public java.lang.String getBestCategory()

      • argMax

        public java.lang.String argMax(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> map)
        Gives the highest probability over all the categories.
        Parameters:
        map - A map with all the categories and its probability
        Returns:
        The category with highest probability. If probability is equal of two categories, first one will be returned.

      • removeRareWords

        public void removeRareWords()
        Removes words that do not occur very often in the document. If the occurrence is less than 0,5% of the text, the word will be removed.

      • run

        public void run()
        This method will check for the best fitting category of the provided file. If the word occurs in the vocabulary it will add its probability to the score. Reoccurring words will be added multiple times depending on the occurrence with the same probability.
